storyMortality.note: The narrative on federal data release during shutdowns has shifted from access to systemic collapse
The focus on the Louvre heist moved from theft to institutional failure and director accountability
The narrative around the Arctic climate impact shifted from speculation to confirmation with first mosquito sighting

topMilestones.what: Trump files $230M claim against DOJ over past investigations, marking a legal and political turning point
Trump announces full demolition of White House East Wing for a $300M private ballroom, sparking historic preservation outcry
U.S. sanctions on Rosneft and Lukoil trigger oil price surge and EU to approve $163B loan using frozen Russian assets
